email_chain.subject: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope you're doing well. We are looking to ship 85,000MT of iron ore from Santos to Rotterdam under CFR terms. Could you please provide a suitable vessel and an initial freight quote?

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN HORIZON, which has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 300m. The initial freight quote is USD 25 per metric tonne. The laycan window is from October 10 to October 15. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Rate Discussion
email_chain.body:
Hello Sophia,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate of USD 25 seems a bit high given the current market conditions. Could you possibly review this? Also, could you provide details on the demurrage rates and the expected loading time in Santos?

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Revised Offer
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

I understand your concerns. After reviewing the market, I can offer a revised rate of USD 22.50 per metric tonne. The demurrage rate is USD 12,000 per day, and the expected loading time in Santos is 3 days. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Final Offer
email_chain.body:
Sophia,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the rate of USD 22.50 per metric tonne. Please confirm the laycan window of October 10 to October 15 and send over the contract for review.

Best regards,
Lucas Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: CFR Santos to Rotterdam, Iron Ore 85000MT - Contract Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Lucas,

Great! I confirm the laycan window of October 10 to October 15. I will send the contract over shortly for your review.

Best regards,
Sophia Lee
